name: My Little Planet - HTML5
description:
Ever wished to rule an entire planet by yourself? Now is your chance. Will you be the kindest of the rulers or an heartless monster? It's up to you. Try to bring your population to glory ( or at least survival ).

5 different types of inhabitants and many other planets who just couldn't fit. Every one of them with a unique feature!

The game is basically a really non serious simulator of a little personal planet. I hope you'll enjoy it

I Used:

-GameMaker Studio

-GIMP

-MuseScore

Do you want to download it to play on your pc and you have windows? Check the desktop version!

https://mindtricks.itch.io/my-little-planet-ld38
